ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Aggro (was Re: Dinosaur)
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Try ... a minor correction : the changes start at 46, when it is possible to enter the old planes... ;-) actually i don t know if the new planes are
ygData.messageBody:
> You are also lvl 40. The rules change drastically when you get to 55+.
Try
> sitting in ToV during a pull and see how fast you die.

a minor "correction": the changes start at 46, when it is possible to enter
the
"old" planes... ;-)

actually i don't know if the new planes are level restricted, because i
never
tried to access one with my smaller alts.

but back to the old planes, i just think of fear: when you move to the first
"camp spot" there is almost no chance to sit down for quite some time...

another place where i hunted with bilt for quite some time: jagged pine.
i camped the dyrads with many roamers around. you really get less
aggro mounted than sitting. but my faction is now so bad with the JP
residents, it doesn't really matter anymore... *g*


- bilt

--
Biltilie Dwimmerlaik, lvl 57 gnome magician, Tarew Marr
